data.actual_result: it disconnects me after changing my status with a more intense reaction when pausing a Spotify song
data.expected_result: it shouldn't disconnect me after changing my status
data.short_description: changing your status(includes pausing Spotify) while being connected to VC disconnects you from it and a webRTC error is thrown in debug when first connected to voice
